entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries near noon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
